articles.title: Tracking apps were supposed to help beat the pandemic. What happened to them?
articles.description: Covid-19 tracking apps were hailed as a way to help countries out of lockdown. Instead many have been delayed, and those that are out are not being downloaded at the rates experts say are needed to have a major effect.
